verses.text: There's a sweet, sweet spirit in this place, And I know that it's the spirit of the Lord; There are sweet expressions on each face, And I know they feel the presence of the Lord.
There are blessings you cannot receive Till you know Him in His fullness and believe; You're the one to profit when you say, "I am going to walk with Jesus all the way."

refrain.text: Sweet Holy Spirit, Sweet Heavenly Dove, Stay right here with us Filling us with Your love, And for these blessings we lift our hearts in praise, Without a doubt we'll know that we have been revived When we shall leave this place.
